excerpt: "Artificial Intelligence Technology Solutions, Inc., ( OTCPK:AITX), today announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary Robotic Assistance Devices Inc. (RAD) has received an order for a ROAMEO 2.0 (Rugged Observation Assistance Mobile Electronic Officer) from a California-based casino operator."
